content:
On the following points of Mahindra and Mahindra, write down a exhaustive essay
-Inventory management
– Supply chain management
– Logistics
– Production Management
– Policy and Regulation related to outsourcing
– Industrial Processes
– Managing Transit Risks
– WTO-related aspects
– Overseas payments
- Take some of the recent operations strategy issues and discuss it.
- Make a SWOT analysis of operations strategy
